messages.subject: Posting on board
messages.body:
Hey Mark,

I saw your post on the message board and I was wondering if you still had that item available. Can you call me if you still do?

Thanks,
Gary Lewis

messages.subject: In Late Today
messages.body:
Mark,
I will be in late today due to an appt.
v/r Bob

messages.subject: July Reports
messages.body:
PYC Staff-
Our weekly meeting is canceled due to the holiday. Please review and submit your PID report before next week's meeting.
Thanks,
Beth

messages.subject: New developer
messages.body:
All,
I'd like to introduce Joe Canfigliata our new S/W developer. If you see him in the office introduce yourself and make him feel welcome.

messages.subject: Proposal for Avid Consulting
messages.body: Mark, I reviewed your proposal with Beth and we have a few questions. Let me know when you time to meet.

messages.subject: Follow-up Appt.
messages.body:
Hi,
Can you please confirm the expense report I submitted for my last trip to SD?
Thanks,
Tom Grey

messages.subject: Subject
messages.body:
Dear Mark,
We've missed you at the shop. How are you and the fam? Let's get together soon.
- James
